actions.text: Amendment SA 965, under the order of 5/22/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 27 - 71. Record Vote Number: 135.

Amendment SA 965 proposed by Senator Sanders. (consideration: CR S3749-3752 ; text: CR S3749-3750) To permit States to require that any food, beverage, or other edible product offered for sale have a label on indicating that the food, beverage, or other edible product contains a genetically engineered ingredient.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 965, under the order of 5/22/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 27 - 71. Record Vote Number: 135.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 965, under the order of 5/22/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 27 - 71. Record Vote Number: 135.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 965 proposed by Senator Sanders.

purpose: To permit States to require that any food, beverage, or other edible product offered for sale have a label on indicating that the food, beverage, or other edible product contains a genetically engineered ingredient.
